stakes.subtitle: Identify risks to better manage them and transform challenges into opportunities

structure.description: Establish solid financial and operational foundations to steer your growth with clarity and anticipate future challenges.
structure.cardDescription: Without a solid financial structure, rapid growth can lead to cash flow issues and loss of control
details: 2 out of 3 fast-growing SMEs experience cash flow tensions within two years of their expansion phase
Operational complexity increases by an average of 30% for each doubling of revenue
Companies that implement management tools early reduce their risk of financial imbalance by 40%

sustain.description: Ensure the continuity and resilience of your business model by optimizing processes and securing your financial governance for a stable future.
sustain.cardDescription: 60% of SMEs acknowledge a need to strengthen their financial and strategic capabilities
details: The average recruitment time for a first CFO is over 6 months, with a total cost often unaffordable for a growing company
When a CFO leaves a company, it takes 4 to 6 months to find a replacement, creating a critical gap in governance and financial management
Engaging a part-time CFO provides immediate access to senior expertise, supports growth, secures financing, and strengthens governance without the cost of a permanent hire

resist.description: Strengthen your ability to navigate uncertainty by identifying risks and deploying agile strategies to turn turbulence into opportunities.
resist.cardDescription: At least 66,000 business failures are expected in France in 2025, a direct consequence of the economic slowdown, the end of public support, and tightening credit conditions
details: Companies with a structured prevention system reduce their risk of bankruptcy by nearly 30%
Nearly 60% of refinancing or debt restructuring requests fail due to lack of a credible business plan
Half of all failures could be avoided through early detection and appropriate support

maximize.description: Fully leverage your assets and equity at key moments by executing strategic transactions that optimize returns for all stakeholders.
maximize.cardDescription: 1/3 of transactions fail directly due to lack of audit or preparation
details: 70% of companies underestimate the difficulties related to business transfer and enter negotiations with incomplete financial information
Transactions prepared in advance with a vendor due diligence close twice as fast
Proper preparation can increase the sale price by 10 to 20%
